name: TheOfferingIsYou
description:
REFRESH GAME PAGE if player is stuck - due to a bug

Controls - - - - - - -

WASD to move (also move the boss wizard when dead)

SPACE to dash

LMB to shoot

Gameplay - - - - - - -

Protect the boss wizard even if it means sacrificing your life

Get upgrades to keep up with the growing strength and numbers your enemies
